item.description:
Our next meeting is on Tuesday, August 10 at 7 PM in the Lounge in the SENIOR CENTER on 49 Pleasant Street off READING SQUARE.

We will be having an open forum. Come with your suggestions, concerns and comments. We will be here to support each other and to help everyone achieve a new level of health.

Don't hesitate to use the meetup site to talk with the group. We need to communicate more in between meetings.

My new schedule for now has me coming to Reading every five weeks. I will be seeing clients for Myotherapy treatments (trigger point technique) and Fibromyalgia one-on-one counseling sessions August 10-16 if you want to schedule a session or refer a friend. I am now offering a 15% discount to support group members. Call me at 623-251-7547 or 617-943-5570 anytime.

Remember I often forget to collect a donation but my costs to run the meeting run around $25 so please donate something if you can, I appreciate your attention.

thanks.

See you in August.
Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia Recovery Meetup
